metadata.title: CVE-2019-11471 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
libheif 1.4.0 has a use-after-free in heif::HeifContext::Image::set_alpha_channel in heif_context.h because heif_context.cc mishandles references to non-existing alpha images.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-11471` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

heif-gdk-pixbuf - 1.4.0-2
heif-thumbnailer - 1.4.0-2
libheif-examples - 1.4.0-2
libheif1 - 1.4.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libheif package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.0-2').
